Top-3 Similar Questions: au_564556: Can't connect to WiFi after suspend
so_24310265: How to connect to using wpa_supplicant on ubuntu 10.04
Top-3 Scripts:
au_564556: #!/bin/bash
case "$1" in
thaw|resume)
sudo nmcli nm sleep false
sudo pkill -f wpa_supplicant
;;
*)
;;
esac
exit $?

so_24310265: ctrl_interface=/var/run/wpa_supplicant

network={
    ssid="367307-Maxis Fibre Internet"
    key_mgmt=WPA-PSK
    psk="429140AEFF"
}

wpa_supplicant -B -i ra0 -c /etc/wpa_supplicant.conf -D wext

wpa_supplicant -dd -i ra0 -c /etc/wpa_supplicant.conf -D wext

Explanations about Options.-D:
Driver to use (can be multiple drivers: nl80211,wext). (Per interface, see the
 available options below.)
Explanations about Options.-i:
Interface to listen on. Multiple instances of this option can be present, one per
 interface, separated by -N option (see below).
